title: Oaty Banana Bread
ingredients: ['100g margarine', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125g plain flour', '80g porridge oats', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '350g mashed bananas', '4 tablespoons milk', '75g chopped raisins (optional)']
